title: Post Game: Republican senators duck questions over Roe, after years of fighting to overturn
description: NBC News Capitol Hill Correspondent Ali Vitali joins Chuck to discuss the leaked Roe decision and the position Senate Republicans find themselves in after years of campaigning for its overturn.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
